item.description:
Come on out and join the crew for a post Christmas hike through the 4200 acre McLean Game Refuge in Granby, CT. The approx 2 hour hike will cover 4-7 miles of easy to moderate wooded terrain through this picturesque refuge. A light lunch/hot chocolate stop after the hike at a local cafe is an option.

McLean is located off Rt 10/202, North of Simsbury Center, South of Granby Center. We will meet in the parking lot right off 10/202. Website has a full description and directions.

For more information, see http://www.mcleancare....
